entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is described as Harry's cousin who is prodding and pinching him. (He couldn’t know that at this very moment, people meeting in secret all over the country were holding up their glasses and saying in hushed voices: ‘To Harry Potter – the boy who lived!’)

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is described as 'the boy who lived' by people meeting in secret all over the country. (He couldn’t know that at this very moment, people meeting in secret all over the country were holding up their glasses and saying in hushed voices: ‘To Harry Potter – the boy who lived!’)
